answers.answer: Checking protein levels and checking to see if you have a uti. and something else I think I can't remember
They are checking for protein in your urine. If you have pre eclampsia the protein in your urine would alert them to that.
They check for like bladdar infection or protein in urine. N for gestational diabetes
Thanks Darci3 and Zim90 but r they checking for glucose too meaning diabetes?
Thanks CindyLovesTito just saw ur reply now. R they checking for just gestational diabetes or for the type 1 and 2 as well?
They check for protein levels in your urine, if you have high blood pressure as well as urine it's a symptom of pre-eclampsia.

question: Why do we have to leave a urine sample everytime we go in for prenatal checkup? What r they checking for?
title: When u go for ur prenatal appt
